entries.title_d: Protect transports from Black Sun aggression.
entries.title: Dathomir System: Duty: Escort Passenger Transports
entries.thanks_5: Any chance you looking for a new career as bodyguard?
entries.thanks_4: Hahaha, they will think twice before attacking us again!
entries.thanks_3: Splendid, finally a pilot that knows what he's doing!
entries.thanks_2: Back in my day, I would have dealt with those pirates twice as fast..
entries.thanks_1: Great job pilot, lets hurry out of here!
entries.taunt_5: I'll guide you back down to the ground... without your ship of course.
entries.taunt_4: You're attacking us in that hunk of junk? You can't be serious.
entries.taunt_3: I will enjoy cutting your ship in half!
entries.taunt_2: We're boarding this ship, now it's just a question if you want to die for it or not.
entries.taunt_1: Get out of here while you still can scum.
entries.shields_depleted: Our shields are down! If you don't get rid of those pilotes, we are done for!
entries.reason_5: Greetings pilot, good to see you. Lets head for the surface quickly, I don't want any incidents.
entries.reason_4: Perfect, a pilot. Last time we didn't get an escort and those Black Sun pirates put my ship in the docks for a month!
entries.reason_3: My job depends on me making this transport on time, so I hope you know what you are doing pilot.
entries.reason_2: Thank you for escorting us pilot. We have passengers on board, so stay alert.
entries.reason_1: There you are. I hope you're good at this, we have cargo that could attract every pirate in the sector...
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Meet the transport at this location
entries.quest_location_d: Transport route through the Dathomir System
entries.quest_escort_d: A passenger transport to be escorted through this sector.
entries.panic_5: Uh oh, we got unwanted attention. I think they are pirates!
entries.panic_4: Oh no, pirates! You better be good at your job pilot!
entries.panic_3: Help us, they will kill us all!
entries.panic_2: Pirate wretches, they want my cargo!
entries.hull_half: Our sensors register multiple hull breeches, you have to take care of those pirates now!
entries.goodbye_5: I'd like to come back in a different ships and teach those scum a thing or two. Anyway, thank you for the help pilot!
entries.goodbye_4: That was a close one and your the only reason we survived. Accept our gratitude pilot.
entries.goodbye_3: After this, I'm putting some defense weapons on my freighter. Thanks again my friend.
entries.goodbye_2: Bumpy ride but we made it in one piece thanks to you pilot.
entries.goodbye_1: You haven't let me down, thank you pilot!
entries.found_loc: We have a request from another transport with important passengers for a safe escort. New coordinates uploaded.
entries.failed_protect: Transport had to escape through a emergency hyperspace jump pilot, there were just too many of the pirates.
entries.failed_destroy: \#pcontrast3 Station Command: < \#pcontrast1 I can't believe these scum destroyed a transport full of innocents. We will need a full report on this tragedy pilot. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_stopped: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Sensors indicate no more fighter vessels with armed weapon systems in area. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.attack_notify: \#pcontrast3 Tactical Computer: < \#pcontrast1 Vessels on intercept course approaching, weapon systems armed. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.arrived_at_loc: \#pcontrast3 Station Command: < \#pcontrast1 Transport is on its way, await their arrival at this location. \#pcontrast3 >
entries.abort: Aborting as ordered. Preparing escape to hyperspace.
